channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title:
视频： 北京火车站人潮涌动，迎接春节高峰。
本周，数亿人从中国各大城市涌出，参加世界上最大规模的年度迁徙，回家分享美食、给长辈拜年，并为即将到来的龙年送上祝福。
item.description:
VIDEO: Crowds throng Beijing railway station for Lunar New Year rush.

Hundreds of millions of people are streaming out of China's major cities this week in the world's largest annual migration, heading home to share meals, pay respects to their elders and deliver blessings for the upcoming Year of the Dragon

item.title: R to @AFP：周四，数百万巴基斯坦人开始投票，这次选举因投票舞弊指控而受到损害，该国最受欢迎的政治家被关押，而军方支持的候选人被认为将获胜。
item.description:
Millions of Pakistanis began voting Thursday in an election marred by allegations of poll rigging, with the country's most popular politician in jail and a military-favoured candidate tipped to win

u.afp.com/5Gqj

item.title:
R to @AFP：#UPDATE "对人类的警告"
欧洲气候监测机构称，地球已持续 12 个月气温比前工业化时代高出 1.5 摄氏度，这是有史以来的第一次
item.description:
#UPDATE "Warning to humanity"

Earth has endured 12 months of temperatures 1.5C hotter than the pre-industrial era for the first time on record, Europe's climate monitor says

u.afp.com/5GqH

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息 巴基斯坦内政部表示，随着选举投票的开始，巴基斯坦已在全国范围内暂停移动电话服务，理由是需要 "维持法律和秩序"。
选民于上午 8:00（格林尼治标准时间 3:00）开始进入投票站，在这次选举中，该国最受欢迎的政治家被关进监狱，被排除在选票之外，而军方支持的候选人则被认为将赢得选举。
item.description:
#UPDATE Pakistan has suspended mobile phone services nationwide as voting begins in the election, the interior ministry says, citing the need to "maintain law and order".

Voters began entering polling stations at 08:00 am (0300 GMT) in an election that sees the country's most popular politician in jail, excluded from the ballot, and a military-backed candidate favoured to win

item.title: #巴基斯坦内政部表示在选举日暂停移动电话服务
item.description: #BREAKING Pakistan suspends mobile telephone service for election day, says interior ministry

item.title: #BREAKING#气候监测员：世界变暖水平首次超过 1.5 摄氏度的 12 个月
item.description: #BREAKING World sees first 12 months above 1.5C warming level: climate monitor

item.title: NFL 在巴西蓬勃发展，贝利故乡出现新式足球
item.description:
New kind of football in the land of Pele as NFL booms in Brazil

u.afp.com/5Gqu

item.title: 美国最高法院周四决定是否禁止唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次竞选总统，勉强成为 2024 年白宫竞选的中心舞台
item.description:
US Supreme Court reluctantly takes center stage in the 2024 White House race on Thursday as it decides whether Donald Trump should be barred from running again for president

u.afp.com/5Gq2

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚总理周四成为有史以来首位在澳大利亚议会发表讲话的太平洋岛国领导人，尽管中国的姿态日益高涨，但巴布亚新几内亚总理仍誓言要与中国保持密切关系。
item.description:
Papua New Guinea's prime minister on Thursday became the first Pacific Island leader ever to address Australia's parliament, vowing close ties despite ever-louder overtures from China

u.afp.com/5Gqd

item.title: 土星的小卫星米马斯似乎不太可能是寻找生命的嫌疑人。但科学家们说，在这颗不起眼的卫星的冰壳下面，隐藏着一个巨大的海洋，其中有许多孕育原始外星生命的必要成分 ⬇️
item.description:
Saturn's small moon Mimas seems an unlikely suspect in the hunt for life. But scientists say that underneath the unassuming moon's icy shell is a vast hidden ocean that has many of the ingredients necessary to host primitive alien life ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GSm

item.title: 专家们周三表示，濒临灭绝的帝王斑蝶在墨西哥越冬地的种群数量急剧下降，并将这一 "令人警醒 "的下降主要归咎于气候变化和杀虫剂的使用 ⬇️。
item.description:
Population numbers of endangered monarch butterflies have fallen sharply at their wintering sites in Mexico, experts said Wednesday, blaming the "sobering" drop primarily on climate change and the use of pesticides ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GqT

item.title: 当局称，一名破产的纽约房地产开发商于周三被起诉，罪名是自 2015 年以来通过一系列精心策划的阴谋从投资者手中窃取了超过 8600 万美元的资金
item.description:
A bankrupt New York property developer was indicted on Wednesday for stealing more than $86 million from investors through an elaborate series of schemes dating back to 2015, authorities said
u.afp.com/5Gq3

item.title: NFL 球员特拉维斯-凯尔斯（Travis Kelce）表示，他因与泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的恋情而成为全球瞩目的焦点，他很享受这种关注 ⬇️
item.description:
NFL player Travis Kelce says he is relishing the attention after being catapulted into the global spotlight via his romance with Taylor Swift ⬇️
u.afp.com/5Gq4

item.title: 迪斯尼公司周三公布，去年最后三个月的利润高于预期，该公司正在努力适应从电视向流媒体的转变。
item.description:
Disney on Wednesday reported higher than expected profit in the final three months of last year as it strives to adapt to a shift from television to streaming.
u.afp.com/5GqZ

item.title: R to @AFP：替补前锋凯莱奇-伊希纳乔（Kelechi Iheanacho）和门将斯坦利-恩瓦巴利（Stanley Nwabali）发挥了关键作用，尼日利亚队在周三的非洲杯半决赛点球大战中以 4-2 的比分击败南非队，与东道主象牙海岸队会师决赛。
item.description:
Substitute forward Kelechi Iheanacho and goalkeeper Stanley Nwabali played key roles as Nigeria beat South Africa 4-2 on penalties on Wednesday in an Africa Cup of Nations semi-final thriller, setting up a final against hosts Ivory Coast.
u.afp.com/5GqJ

item.title:
周四，数百万巴基斯坦人将在选举中投票，暴力事件已造成数十人死亡，投票前操纵选举的指控，以及该国最受欢迎的政治家伊姆兰-汗（Imran Khan）被关进监狱，都给这次选举蒙上了阴影。
🖊️ by @emmaclarkuk and @ZainZamanJanjua ⬇️
item.description:
Millions of Pakistanis vote Thursday in an election marred by violence that has killed dozens, allegations of pre-poll rigging, and the jailing of the country's most popular politician, Imran Khan.

🖊️ by @emmaclarkuk and @ZainZamanJanjua ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GTQ

item.title: 前巴西国脚丹尼-阿尔维斯周三在西班牙接受审判的最后一天出庭作证时否认在巴塞罗那夜总会强奸一名年轻女子 ⬇️
item.description:
Former Brazil international Dani Alves denied raping a young woman at a Barcelona nightclub as he took the stand Wednesday on the last day of his trial in Spain ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GTN

item.title: #东道主象牙海岸进入非洲国家杯决赛
item.description: #BREAKING Hosts Ivory Coast into Africa Cup of Nations final

item.title: 在美国右翼脱口秀主持人塔克-卡尔森（Tucker Carlson）采访俄罗斯总统 ⬇️ 之后，白宫周三表示，不应再给弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）提供一个为其乌克兰战争辩护的喉舌。
item.description:
The White House said Wednesday that Vladimir Putin should not be given another mouthpiece to justify his war in Ukraine, after right-wing US talk show host Tucker Carlson interviewed the Russian president ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GTG

item.title: 威廉王子在其父查尔斯三世国王被确诊患上癌症后于周三重返工作岗位，而他疏远的弟弟哈里王子也准备飞回美国，此前他一直陪伴在父亲身边 ⬇️。
item.description:
Prince William returned to work on Wednesday following his father King Charles III's shock cancer diagnosis, as his estranged brother Prince Harry prepared to fly home to the United States after rallying to his father's side ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GTc

item.title: 俄罗斯对基辅和其他地区发动新一轮导弹袭击，造成首都四人死亡，40 多人受伤，乌克兰周三敦促西方国家加快并增加炮弹的供应 ⬇️
item.description:
Ukraine urged the West on Wednesday to speed up and increase deliveries of artillery shells after a new Russian missile attack on Kyiv and other regions killed four in the capital and wounded more than 40 ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GTq

item.title: 射手阿克拉姆-阿菲夫（Akram Afif）说："最好的还在后面"，东道主卡塔尔周三以 3-2 的比分战胜伊朗，成功晋级亚洲杯决赛，将与约旦争夺冠军 #AFPSports
item.description:
Goal-scorer Akram Afif said "the best is yet to come" after hosts and holders Qatar squeezed into an Asian Cup final against Jordan with a dramatic 3-2 win over Iran on Wednesday #AFPSports
u.afp.com/5GTZ

item.title: 乔-拜登总统的政府周三宣布了严厉的新空气质量标准，称这是保护脆弱社区健康的迫切需要，但工业团体表示此举将损害国内制造业 ⬇️
item.description:
President Joe Biden's administration on Wednesday announced tough new air quality standards it said were sorely needed to protect the health of vulnerable communities, though industry groups have said the move would harm domestic manufacturing ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GSF

item.title: 国际刑事法庭首席检察官周三告诉法新社，他希望法庭能够开始审判犯有 "环境罪 "的嫌疑人，而无需修改其创始章程 ⬇️。
item.description:
The International Criminal Court's chief prosecutor told AFP on Wednesday that he wants the tribunal to start trying suspects for "environmental crimes" without having to modify its founding statutes ⬇️
u.afp.com/5GSr

item.title: 曾被美国橄榄球联盟视为禁区的拉斯维加斯正准备上演一场霓虹闪烁的超级碗盛宴，这将标志着内华达州博彩天堂向全球体育中心转型的最高荣誉。
item.description:
Once regarded as a no-go zone by the NFL, Las Vegas is preparing to stage a neon-lit Super Bowl spectacular that will mark the crowning glory of the Nevada gaming haven's transformation into a global sporting hub.
u.afp.com/5GS2

item.title: 民主党人将于周三强行就已经遭到唐纳德-特朗普破坏的美国移民改革进行投票，他们希望借此凸显共和党在一系列羞辱性立法挫折中的功能失调。
item.description:
Democrats will force a vote Wednesday on US immigration reform that has already been sabotaged by Donald Trump, as they bid to highlight Republican dysfunction underscored by a series of humiliating legislative setbacks
u.afp.com/5GSe

item.title: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥-古特雷斯（Antonio Guterres）周三警告说，世界正在进入一个 "混乱的时代"，严重分裂的安理会无法解决以色列-哈马斯战争等关键问题。
item.description:
UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned Wednesday that the world is entering "an age of chaos", with a deeply divided Security Council unable to address critical issues such as the Israel-Hamas war
u.afp.com/5GSQ

item.title:
视频：🇨🇳 中国人忍耐过年旅行高峰，只为品尝家乡的味道
本周，数以百万计的城市居民挤在火车车厢里，离开中国各大城市返回家乡，共享美食、向长辈拜年，并为即将到来的龙年送上祝福。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇨🇳 Chinese endure New Year travel rush for taste of home

Packed into train carriages, millions of urbanites this week leave China's major cities for their hometowns to share meals, pay respects to elders and deliver blessings for the upcoming #YearOfTheDragon

item.title: R to @AFP：#BREAKING 新一轮加沙谈判将于周四在开罗开始：埃及消息来源
item.description: #BREAKING New round of Gaza negotiations to start Thursday in Cairo: Egyptian source

item.title: R to @AFP：#联合国援助负责人周三表示，苏丹交战双方已同意在联合国的调解下举行会谈，以便为饱受冲突蹂躏的苏丹提供急需的援助 ➡️
item.description: #UPDATE Sudan's warring sides have agreed to meet in United Nations-mediated talks on enabling desperately needed aid delivery in their conflict-torn country, the UN aid chief said on Wednesday ➡️ u.afp.com/5G5a
